tidbits.title: Baltic Beauty
tidbits.description: Lithuania is a Baltic beauty with charming medieval towns, lush forests, and the exquisite Curonian Spit, a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

tidbits.title: Cultural Heritage
tidbits.description: The country has a rich cultural heritage, seen in its folklore traditions, vibrant festivals, and a deep appreciation for arts and music.

tidbits.title: Basketball Passion
tidbits.description: Lithuania is passionate about basketball, with a strong basketball culture and a history of success in international competitions.
